video_summary: A neon-soaked chase through rain-slicked streets that resolves with a hopeful rooftop finale.

characters.description: Young woman, reflective visor, iridescent trench coat, determined expression
Holographic guide, translucent blue light form

scenes.description: Claustrophobic alley with neon billboards, puddles reflecting cyan lights
Open rooftop overlooking skyline, early dawn light

clip_scripts.visual_description: Protagonist steps into neon rain, reflections swirling around her boots.
clip_scripts.motion: Slow push in as rain falls diagonally across frame.
clip_scripts.camera_angle: Medium wide shot, slightly low angle.

clip_scripts.visual_description: Holographic ally materializes, guiding her toward blinding light.
They reach rooftop as dawn breaks, skyline glowing.
clip_scripts.camera_angle: Wide shot from behind characters, slight tilt.
